title: Target of European debris removal mission hit by other debris
summary: A payload adapter that is the target of a European debris cleanup mission may have itself been damaged by a debris impact.

title: NASA and SpaceX give GO for Crew 7 launch
summary: Following the Flight Readiness Review (FRR), NASA and SpaceX gave the go for Crew 7. The launch is scheduled for August 25th...

title: Police are investigating an Indian actor for joking about the country’s Moon lander
summary: There is a lot of national fervor surrounding Chandrayaan 3.

title: Polaris Dawn mission likely to slip to 2024
summary: The billionaire backing a series of private astronaut missions with SpaceX says the first of those flights will likely be delayed to some time in 2024.

title: Mynaric to design optical ground terminal for U.S. military constellation
summary: Mynaric, a supplier of laser communications terminals, was selected by the Space Development Agency to design an optical ground station to transmit to and receive data from satellites in low Earth orbit.
